name: retrom
description: Retrom is a self-hosted retro gaming management system with collections, metadata, and a web dashboard to organize and track ROMs across platforms.
features: ROM library management: Organize retro game ROMs by platform, genre, and custom categories.
Metadata fetching: Automatically download game information, box art, and descriptions.
Multi-platform support: Manage games from NES, SNES, Genesis, PlayStation, and dozens of other systems.
Web dashboard: Browse and search your collection through a responsive browser interface.
Collection tracking: Mark games as owned, completed, or on your wishlist.
Duplicate detection: Identify and manage duplicate ROMs across your library.
Search functionality: Find games quickly by title, platform, or metadata.
Custom tags: Add personal tags to games for flexible organization.
Statistics: View collection size, completion rates, and platform breakdowns.
Import tools: Bulk import ROMs from folders with automatic organization.
Backup management: Track which ROMs are backed up and where.
API access: Integrate with emulators or other tools using REST endpoints.
